lemma red_external_aggr_known_addrs_WriteMem: "\<lbrakk> (ta, va, h') \<in> red_external_aggr P t a M vs h; \<lbrace>ta\<rbrace>\<^bsub>o\<^esub> ! n = WriteMem ad al (Addr a'); n < length \<lbrace>ta\<rbrace>\<^bsub>o\<^esub> \<rbrakk> \<Longrightarrow> a' \<in> {thread_id2addr t, a} \<union> (\<Union>(ka_Val ` set vs)) \<union> set start_addrs \<union> new_obs_addrs (take n \<lbrace>ta\<rbrace>\<^bsub>o\<^esub>)"
